entry.tran: （马克思主义理论中的）资产阶级
entry.def: In Marxist theory, the bourgeoisie are the middle-class people who own most of the wealth in a capitalist system.

example.ex: ...the suppression of the proletariat by the bourgeoisie.
example.tran: 资产阶级对无产阶级的压迫
